name: Inferno’s Embrace
summary: Embark on a journey to Wyverndale Academy, where you’ll uncover a hidden society of dragon hybrids and confront secrets that blur the line between humanity and magic. As dark forces rise, team up with dragons Niko, Vidar, and Dravon to navigate a world torn between peaceful coexistence and looming dominance. Embrace your unique power, balance loyalty and duty, and rewrite your destiny!
